summary: Email chain from July 3, 2020, regarding a potential witness/victim reaching out to the FBI New York Field Office with information related to the Epstein investigation. The individual claims to have been raped 20 years prior and to have information that may help connect dots. FBI personnel coordinate to have the appropriate task force agents contact her.

persons.name: Sweeney
persons.role: Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) of FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: The potential witness initially contacted ADIC Sweeney via LinkedIn. Sweeney's office is handling the coordination of the response.

persons.name: Ms.
persons.context: An individual who reached out to the FBI claiming to have information related to a rape she experienced 20 years ago, potentially connected to the Epstein investigation. She prefers a Zoom call for security.

connections.description: Ms. initiated contact with ADIC Sweeney via LinkedIn regarding potential information for the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Witness Outreach to FBI
events.description: A potential witness emails the FBI New York Field Office, stating she has information potentially related to the Epstein investigation stemming from a rape she experienced approximately 20 years prior.

events.title: Alleged Rape of Witness
events.description: The witness references being raped 20 years prior to the 2020 email, and that she tried to seek justice at that time but the climate was not conducive.

keyFacts: A potential witness contacted the FBI in July 2020 claiming to have information related to a rape from 20 years earlier that may be relevant to the Epstein investigation.
The witness expressed a preference for a Zoom interview over a phone call due to security concerns and past bad experiences online.
The witness mentioned having lived under provable online threat for over 20 years, though she states it has much diminished.
The FBI response indicates the Epstein investigation is handled by a specific task force within the New York Field Office.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination to have the appropriate agents contact the potential witness.
